string-array.name: menu_titles_array
string-array.item: Medications
Alarms
Records
Pharmacies
Statistics
About
Sign Out

string-array.name: late_alerts_low_array
string-array.item: A few late doses, consider amending the time you take doses.
A small amount of late doses, delaying doses can effect effectiveness.
A couple of late doses, try to take doses closer to alarm times.

string-array.name: late_alerts_med_array
string-array.item: Some late doses, try to take doses on time to increase effectiveness.
Increasing amount of late doses, consider discussing this with your doctor.
More missed doses will make medications less effective.

string-array.name: late_alerts_high_array
string-array.item: Majority of doses are late, medications will be less effective.
Excessive amount of late doses, talk to your doctor about this.
Too many missed doses, effectiveness of medication is compromised

string-array.name: missed_alerts_low_array
string-array.item: A few missed doses, missing more may effect treatment.
A couple of missed doses, try not to miss any more.
A small amount of missed doses, this can effect the medication.

string-array.name: missed_alerts_med_array
string-array.item: Some missed doses, any more and medication will prove to be ineffective.
Increasing amount of missed doses, medications effectiveness effected.
More missed doses, medication effectiveness will suffer.

string-array.name: missed_alerts_high_array
string-array.item: Excessive amount of missed doses, discuss this with your doctor.
Too many missed doses, medication will be ineffective.
A lot of missed doses, medication will be ineffective.
